BasicInfo.short: Tynker is a creative computing platform where millions of kids have learned to program and built games, apps and more.

Products.name: Tynker for Android Tablet
Products.description: Play fun puzzles to learn the basics and then create your own amazing games using over 100 step-by-step coding tutorials.

Products.name: Tynker for Camps
Products.description: Everything you need to start a programming camp or after school class

Products.name: Tynker Hour of Code
Products.description: Solve fun puzzles that teach you the basics of computational thinking and programming and build your own game using guided tutorials.

Products.name: Game Design and Modding for Minecraft
Products.description: Design and publish mods, skins, block textures and items and publish with 1-click

Products.name: Tynker for iPad
Products.description: Play fun puzzles to learn the basics and then create your own amazing games using over 100 step-by-step coding tutorials.

PastTeam.title: Director, UI/UX Design & Front End Development
